faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.q1: Is there a minimum budget requirement?
faq.a1: No, we offer partnership options for every budget. Contact us and we'll find the best option for you together.
faq.q2: What is the advertising placement duration?
faq.a2: Ad durations can vary - weekly, monthly or annual options are available. You can choose the duration that suits your campaign goals.
faq.q3: How can I join as a content creator?
faq.a3: Send us your portfolio or sample work. We're open to collaborating with anyone who creates quality pet-related content.
faq.q4: How can I track partnership results?
faq.a4: We provide detailed analytics reports to all partners. You'll have access to views, clicks and conversion data.

hero.title: Make your ad premium and get 10x more visibility
hero.description: Premium ads sell 5-7 times faster on average. Your ad appears at the top of search results and homepage, gets a special premium badge, and reaches more potential buyers.

featured.description: Your ad appears at the very top in search results and homepage

premium.paymentNote: Contact admin for payment. Your ad will become premium immediately after payment.

whatIsPremium.question: What is the premium ad service?
whatIsPremium.answer: Premium ad service is a paid service that ensures your ad gets more visibility on the platform and sells faster. Your ad is featured in search results, category pages, and on the homepage.

howPayment.question: How is payment processed?
howPayment.answer: You must contact the admin for payment. Payment can be made by bank card, mobile payment, or bank transfer. Your ad will immediately become premium after payment.

duration.question: How long is the premium status valid?
duration.answer: Premium status is valid for 1, 3, or 6 months depending on the package you choose. After expiration, your ad returns to standard status. You can extend the duration if you wish.

effectiveness.question: How effective are premium ads?
effectiveness.answer: According to statistics, premium ads sell 5-7 times faster on average and get 10 times more views. Thanks to featured placement and premium badge, trust increases and more buyers show interest.

multipleAds.question: Can I get premium for multiple ads?
multipleAds.answer: Yes, you can get premium service for as many ads as you want. Separate payment is required for each ad. Discounts are available for multiple ads, contact admin for details.

cta.title: Ready?
cta.description: Contact us and make your ad premium. Your ad will be featured immediately after payment.
cta.contactEmail: Have any questions? You can write to us at premium@puppy.az.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Platform's main features and first steps

whatIsPuppy.question: What is Puppy.az and how does it work?
whatIsPuppy.answer:
Puppy.az is a platform created for buying, selling, searching, and protecting pets in Azerbaijan.

**Main features:**
• Buy and sell pets
• Search for lost and found animals
• Find mating partners
• Adoption listings

The platform allows users to connect with animal lovers safely and conveniently.

howToRegister.question: How do I register?
howToRegister.answer:
The registration process is very simple:

1. Click the "Login" button
2. Select "Register" option
3. Enter your email, phone, and password
4. Open the email confirmation link
5. Complete your profile

Registration is completely free and takes 2-3 minutes.

isFree.question: Is the platform free to use?
isFree.answer:
Yes, Puppy.az is completely free to use.

**Free services:**
• Registration and account creation
• Posting ads
• Searching and viewing ads
• Contacting sellers
• Adding to favorites

Premium features may be added in the future (promoting ads, statistics, etc.), but core functions will always remain free.

mobileApp.question: Is there a mobile app?
mobileApp.answer:
Currently there is no mobile app, but our site is fully optimized for mobile devices.

**Mobile browser features:**
• Full functionality
• Fast loading
• Convenient interface
• Push notifications (in browser)

Work is underway on iOS and Android apps and will be released soon.

postingAds.title: Posting Ads
postingAds.description: Information about creating and editing ads

howToPost.question: How do I post an ad?
howToPost.answer:
To post an ad:

1. Log in to your account
2. Click "New Ad" or "+" button
3. Select animal type (dog, cat, etc.)
4. Select ad type (sale, lost, found, mating, adoption)
5. Fill out the form:
   • Animal information (type, breed, age, gender)
   • Upload photos (minimum 3, maximum 10)
   • Write description
   • Price and contact information
6. Click "Publish" button

Your ad will be sent for moderation and reviewed within 24 hours.

howManyPhotos.question: How many photos can I upload?
howManyPhotos.answer:
You can upload a minimum of 3 and a maximum of 10 photos per ad.

**Photo requirements:**
• Format: JPG, PNG, WebP
• Maximum size: 10MB per photo
• Recommended size: 1200x800 pixels
• Must be high quality and clear

**Recommendations:**
• First photo should be the best and clearest
• Photograph the animal from different angles
• Use photos taken in natural light
• Don't add watermarks or logos

approvalTime.question: How long does it take for my ad to be approved?
approvalTime.answer:
Ads are usually checked and approved within 24 hours.

**Moderation process:**
1. You posted your ad → "Pending" status
2. Moderator reviews → 2-24 hours
3. Approved → "Active" status and visible on site
4. Or rejected → reason provided

**Rejection reasons:**
• Inappropriate content or photos
• Wrong category or information
• Unethical ad (animal cruelty, etc.)
• Duplicate ad

You can correct and republish a rejected ad.

howToEdit.question: How can I edit my ad?
howToEdit.answer:
You can edit active ads at any time:

1. Go to "My Account" page
2. Enter "Active Ads" section
3. Find the ad you want to edit
4. Click "Edit" button
5. Make changes and save

**Note:** Updating an ad does not require re-moderation (if core information hasn't changed). However, significant changes (e.g., price, breed) may be re-checked.

adDuration.question: How long does an ad last?
adDuration.answer:
Ads remain active for 90 days.

**Ad duration:**
• Standard period: 90 days
• You receive a warning 7 days before expiration
• You can renew the ad at any time
• If sold or no longer needed, delete with "Close" button

**Renewal:** When you refresh an ad, it moves to the top and gets another 90 days.

buyingSelling.title: Buying & Selling
buyingSelling.description: The process of buying and selling animals

howToContact.question: How do I contact the seller?
howToContact.answer:
You can contact the seller via the "Contact" button at the bottom of the ad.

**Contact methods:**
• Phone call (number displayed)
• WhatsApp message
• Internal messaging system (coming soon)

**Recommendations:**
• Introduce yourself in the first message
• Ask questions about the animal
• Schedule a meeting time
• Be cautious of suspicious ads

howPayment.question: How is payment made?
howPayment.answer:
Puppy.az is a classified ads platform, payment is made directly between buyer and seller.

**Payment methods (depends on seller):**
• Cash payment (at meeting)
• Bank card transfer
• Mobile payment systems

**Security rules:**
• Never pay the full amount in advance
• Don't pay without seeing the animal
• Request veterinary check
• Verify documents (passport, vaccination card)

The platform is not an intermediary in the payment process, it only connects buyers and sellers.

beforeMeeting.question: What should I pay attention to before going to see the animal?
beforeMeeting.answer:
Follow these steps before going to a meeting:

**Preparation:**
1. Talk to the seller in detail and ask questions
2. Verify that photos are original
3. Ask about veterinary examination
4. Discuss price and payment terms

**At the meeting:**
• Meet in a public place (for security)
• If possible, bring a familiar veterinarian
• Check the animal's health
• Request documents (passport, vaccination sheet)
• Observe behavior

**Warnings:**
• Be suspicious of very cheap prices
• Be careful with phrases like "urgent sale" or "emergency"
• Avoid ads requesting advance payment

avoidScams.question: How do I protect myself from fraud?
avoidScams.answer:
Follow these rules for your safety:

**Red flags:**
• Suspiciously low prices
• Requesting only advance payment
• Refusing to meet
• Fake ads with internet photos
• Excuses like "urgent sale", "I'm abroad"

**Safe transaction:**
1. Always see the animal in person
2. Cash payment, only at meeting
3. Meet in public places
4. Verify documents and passport
5. Conduct veterinary examination

**When you see a suspicious ad:**
Report it to us with the "Report" button. We will immediately investigate and take action.

changePassword.question: How do I change my password?
changePassword.answer:
To change your password:

1. Go to "My Account" page
2. Enter "Security" section
3. Click "Change Password" button
4. Enter your old password
5. Set a new password (minimum 8 characters)
6. Confirm new password

**Password requirements:**
• Minimum 8 characters
• At least 1 uppercase letter
• At least 1 lowercase letter
• At least 1 number
• Special character recommended

forgotPassword.question: I forgot my password, what should I do?
forgotPassword.answer:
If you forgot your password:

1. Click "Forgot password?" link on login page
2. Enter the email you used during registration
3. Open the link sent to your email (within 5-10 minutes)
4. Set a new password
5. Log in with new password

**Email not arriving:**
• Check spam folder
• Wait 5 minutes
• Make sure you entered the correct email
• Contact support: {supportEmail}

updateProfile.question: How do I update my profile information?
updateProfile.answer:
You can update your profile information at any time:

1. "My Account" → "Profile Information"
2. Edit the field you want to change:
   • First and last name
   • Profile photo
   • Phone number
   • Location
   • About me
3. Click "Save" button

**Note:** To change email address, you must verify the new email.

deleteAccount.question: How can I delete my account?
deleteAccount.answer:
If you want to delete your account:

1. "My Account" → "Security"
2. Scroll down to "Delete Account" section
3. Click "Delete my account" button
4. Select reason (optional)
5. Confirm by entering your password

**Warning:** This action cannot be undone!

**Data to be deleted:**
• All your ads
• Your favorites
• Your messages
• Profile information

Don't forget to close your active ads before deleting your account.

isDataSafe.question: Is my data secure?
isDataSafe.answer:
Yes, the security of your data is our priority.

**Security measures:**
• SSL encryption (HTTPS)
• Passwords stored with hash algorithm
• Two-factor authentication (coming soon)
• Constant server security checks
• Compliance with GDPR and Azerbaijan laws

**Privacy:**
• Your phone number is only visible to ad owners
• Email is not shown to anyone
• Personal data is not sold to third parties

For detailed information, see the [Privacy Policy](/privacy) page.

reportAd.question: What should I do when I see inappropriate or fake ads?
reportAd.answer:
Report violations to us immediately:

**To file a complaint:**
1. Click the "⋮" menu in the upper right corner of the ad
2. Select "Report" option
3. Note the reason for complaint:
   • Fake ad
   • Fraud
   • Inappropriate content
   • Animal cruelty
   • Duplicate ad
4. Write additional comment (optional)
5. Submit

Your complaint will be reviewed within 24 hours and action will be taken.

prohibitedAds.question: What ads are prohibited?
prohibitedAds.answer:
These types of ads are prohibited on the platform:

**Prohibited content:**
• Illegal animal species
• Animal fighting and cruelty
• Unethical sale of sick or injured animals
• Sale of babies under 2 months
• Sexual content
• Spam and advertisements

**Prohibited behavior:**
• Fake information and photos
• Fraud attempts
• Repeated duplicate ads
• Harassment of other users
• Violation of platform rules

Violations may result in account blocking by moderators.

isPaid.question: Is Puppy.az paid?
isPaid.answer:
No, using the Puppy.az platform is completely free.

**Free services:**
• Registration and account creation
• Ad posting (unlimited)
• Ad search and viewing
• Contact with sellers
• Favorite ads

**Future premium services (planned):**
• Ad promotion
• Special badges and labels
• Detailed statistics
• Priority support

Core functions will always remain free.

premiumAds.question: Why are some ads marked "Premium"?
premiumAds.answer:
Currently there is no premium ad system. All ads are displayed equally.

In the future, ad owners will be able to get premium services to promote their ads:

**Premium ad features (planned):**
• Featured in search results
• Display on homepage
• Special "Premium" badge
• More statistics
• Longer ad duration

More information about these services will be announced soon.

technicalIssue.question: What should I do if a technical problem occurs?
technicalIssue.answer:
If you're experiencing a technical problem, follow these steps:

**First steps:**
1. Refresh the page (F5 or Ctrl+R)
2. Clear browser cache
3. Try a different browser
4. Check your internet connection

**If problem persists:**
• Take a screenshot
• Contact support: {supportEmail}
• Phone: {phoneNumber}
• Working hours: {workingHours}

**Information to send:**
• Problem description
• Screenshot
• Browser and device information
• Step-by-step what you did

photoUpload.question: I can't upload my photos, what should I do?
photoUpload.answer:
If you're having photo upload issues:

**Check:**
• Photo format: Must be JPG, PNG, WebP
• Photo size: Maximum 10MB
• Internet speed: Weak connection can cause problems
• Browser permissions: Allow file upload

**Solutions:**
• Reduce photo size (online compression)
• Upload a different photo
• Refresh browser
• Try uploading from mobile device

If problem persists, contact support.

emailNotifications.question: I'm not receiving email notifications, what should I do?
emailNotifications.answer:
If email notifications aren't coming:

**Check:**
1. Check **Spam/Junk** folder
2. Make sure you entered email address correctly
3. Enable notifications in account settings
4. Check email provider (Gmail, Outlook) filters

**Change email address:**
1. My Account → Profile Information
2. Enter new email
3. Confirm with confirmation link

**Notification settings:**
In My Account → Notifications section, select which notifications you want to receive.

contactSupport.question: How can I contact support?
contactSupport.answer:
Our support team is ready to help you:

**Contact methods:**
📧 Email: {supportEmail}
📞 Phone: {phoneNumber}
⏰ Working hours: {workingHours}

**For quick response:**
• Explain the problem in detail
• Add screenshot
• Note your account information
• Write step-by-step what happened

Average response time: 2-24 hours

**For urgent problems:**
Phone contact provides faster resolution.

whoRuns.question: Who runs Puppy.az?
whoRuns.answer:
Puppy.az is a platform created and managed by animal lovers in Azerbaijan.

**Our mission:**
To facilitate safe and ethical buying, selling, protecting, and adopting pets in Azerbaijan.

**Our values:**
• Animal welfare
• Transparency and ethics
• User security
• Community support

Every ad and user is checked by moderators to ensure rules are followed.

commercialUse.question: Can I use Puppy.az for commercial purposes?
commercialUse.answer:
Yes, professional breeders and pet shops can use our platform.

**For commercial users:**
• You can create a company account
• You can post unlimited ads
• You can add your brand name and logo
• You can receive customer reviews

**Requirements:**
• Legal license and documents
• Compliance with animal welfare rules
• Transparency and ethical behavior
• Providing accurate information

To create a professional account, contact {supportEmail}.

languageSupport.question: Is there language support? Will there be an English version?
languageSupport.answer:
Currently Puppy.az is only in Azerbaijani.

**Future plans:**
• English language support (by end of 2025)
• Russian language support
• Multilingual interface

The platform is primarily designed for the Azerbaijan market, but we are also developing for international users.

feedback.question: How do I send feedback and suggestions?
feedback.answer:
Your feedback and suggestions are very valuable to us!

**Send feedback:**
📧 Email: {supportEmail}
💬 "Contact" form on site
📞 Phone: {phoneNumber}

**Topics you can suggest:**
• New features
• Design improvements
• Technical issues
• User experience
• Content and category suggestions

Every suggestion is carefully considered and implemented if possible. Thank you! 🙏

contactBanner.title: Can't find the answer you're looking for?
contactBanner.description: Our support team is ready to help you

banner.title: Your Privacy is Our Priority
banner.description: This policy is effective from {date}. We explain in detail how your personal data is collected, processed, and protected. Read to fully understand your rights.

descriptions.access: Learn what information we store about you
descriptions.delete: Delete your account and information completely
descriptions.transfer: Transfer your data to another service

contact.title: Privacy Questions
contact.description: If you have questions about our privacy policy or want to exercise your rights:

banner.title: Important Notice
banner.description: These terms are effective from {date}. By using the service, you agree to these terms. Please read carefully.

contact.title: Questions or Issues?
contact.description: If you have questions about the terms of service, you can contact us:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content:
These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern the use of the PetMarket platform and mobile application ("Service"). By using the Service, you fully accept these terms and undertake to comply with them.

If you do not agree with these terms, do not use the service. These terms constitute a legal contract and are binding on you.

services.title: Service Description
services.content:
PetMarket is an online platform for buying and selling animals in Azerbaijan. Our service offers:

• Posting ads for sale of pets and other animals
• Establishing contact between buyers and sellers
• Sharing and searching pet information
• Premium ad services
• Payment systems and secure transactions

Our platform supports only legal animal trade and does not allow any illegal activities.

viewTransitionsDemo.title: View Transitions Demo
viewTransitionsDemo.subtitle: React 19.2 View Transitions for smooth navigation

popularLinks.subtitle: Our most visited pages

searchBar.title: Still can't find it?
searchBar.subtitle: Search to find the pet you're looking for
searchBar.placeholder: E.g., Golden Retriever puppy, Persian cat...

encouragement.text: Your perfect friend is waiting for you!

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content:
We collect only necessary information to protect your privacy and use it transparently.

**Information we collect:**

• **Account information**: Name, surname, email, phone number, password
• **Profile information**: Profile photo, location, experience information
• **Ad information**: Pet photos, descriptions, prices, contact details
• **Technical information**: IP address, device type, browser information
• **Usage statistics**: Which pages you visit, time spent in the app

**Automatically collected information:**
When you enter the site, some information is automatically collected - cookies, IP address, browser type and usage statistics. This information is for improving service quality.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content:
We use the information we collect only for legitimate purposes and never sell it to third parties.

**Main usage purposes:**

• **Service provision**: Account management and platform operation
• **Contact establishment**: Secure communication between buyers and sellers
• **Security**: Fraud prevention and account protection
• **Support service**: Resolving technical problems and customer support
• **Improvement**: Increasing platform functionality

**Marketing and notifications:**
We send you suitable ad recommendations, information about new services and important updates. You can opt out of these notifications at any time.

**Legal requirements:**
In accordance with Azerbaijan laws, we may provide information with a court order or request from law enforcement agencies.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content:
We share your personal information only in the following cases and in a limited manner:

**Service providers:**
• **Payment systems**: For secure payment transactions
• **Hosting services**: For data storage and platform operation
• **Email services**: For sending notifications
• **SMS services**: For verification codes and important notifications

All these companies have signed confidentiality agreements and use the information only under our instructions.

**With other users:**
When you post an ad, your contact information is shown to potential buyers. You manage this information yourself.

**Legal requirements:**
We may provide information in case of court order, law enforcement request, or national security matters.

**We never sell:**
We do not sell your personal information to advertising companies, data brokers, or other commercial organizations.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content:
Your data security is our priority and we apply the highest standards.

**Technical protection measures:**
• **SSL encryption**: All data transmission is encrypted
• **Strong encryption**: Data is encrypted with AES-256 standard
• **Secure servers**: Data is stored in protected centers
• **Regular backup**: Backup copies to prevent data loss

**Access control:**
• **Two-factor authentication**: For account security
• **Limited access**: Only authorized employees access data
• **Audit log**: All operations are recorded and monitored

**Security checks:**
We regularly conduct security tests and look for potential vulnerabilities.

**Incident response:**
In case of data breach, we inform you and relevant authorities within 72 hours.

hero.title: Safe Shopping
hero.subtitle: Important tips to protect yourself and your pet when buying or selling on puppy.az

tips.title: Safety Tips
tips.subtitle: Important safety rules for buyers and sellers

warnings.title: Warning Signs
warnings.subtitle: Recognize scam signs and protect yourself

practices.title: Best Practices
practices.subtitle: Recommendations for successful and safe transactions

buyers.title: For Buyers
buyers.description: Things to pay attention to when buying a pet
buyers.tip1: Always see the pet in person and meet the seller face-to-face
buyers.tip2: Check the pet's health condition and vaccination card
buyers.tip3: Look at the seller's other ads and reviews
buyers.tip4: Be suspicious of prices much lower than market value
buyers.tip5: Never pay the full amount before seeing the pet
buyers.tip6: Make a written agreement about the purchase

sellers.title: For Sellers
sellers.description: Protect your safety when selling your pet
sellers.tip1: Gather information about the buyer and investigate their intentions
sellers.tip2: Meet in a public place for the first meeting, not at your home
sellers.tip3: Accept payment in cash or through secure methods
sellers.tip4: Follow up on the pet's transition to the new owner
sellers.tip5: Prepare written documentation about the sale

meetings.title: Meeting Guidelines
meetings.tip3: Inform your close ones about the meeting place and time
meetings.tip5: Be careful when sharing personal information

payments.title: Payment Safety
payments.description: Important tips to protect your money
payments.tip1: Never make payment without seeing the pet
payments.tip2: Avoid wire transfer or cryptocurrency payments
payments.tip3: Stay away from sellers who require advance deposit
payments.tip4: Get a payment receipt or written confirmation

warnings.highSubtitle: Be cautious if you see these signs

high.price: Price much lower than market value
high.deposit: Request for deposit or full payment before meeting
high.shipping: Offer to ship the pet by mail

medium.photos: Low quality or stock photos from the internet
medium.contact: Only message contact, doesn't accept phone calls

verify.title: Verify
verify.description: Check the seller's profile, reviews and other ads

photos.title: Photos
photos.description: Request live video call or additional photos

communicate.title: Communicate
communicate.description: Chat within the platform so history is preserved

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Share personal information only when necessary

report.title: Report Suspicious Activity
report.description: If you encounter fraud or suspicious behavior, report it to us immediately. Our team investigates every complaint.

comingSoon.title: Blog Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: Useful articles about pet care, health, and training are being prepared. They will be here soon!
